mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(nt_no, me_no, nt_title, nt_content ) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(nt_no), 0)+1 as nt_no FROM notice), #{me_no}, #{nt_title}, #{nt_content})
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM notice
WHERE nt_title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE nt_content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE nt_title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR nt_content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'

SELECT nt_no, me_no, nt_title, nt_content, nt_date, r FROM( SELECT nt_no, me_no, nt_title, nt_content, nt_date, rownum as r FROM( SELECT nt_no, me_no, nt_title, nt_content, nt_date FROM notice
where nt_title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
where nt_content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
where nt_title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR nt_content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
ORDER BY nt_no DESC ) ) WHERE r >=#{startNum} AND r <= #{endNum}
